column4: Hi! I am upgrading a server that I don't have physical access to, and after the upgrade, I am supposed to reboot it. The problem is that it doesn't want to reboot, ie. after giving the 'reboot' command, the "The system is going down for reboot NOW!" line is printed, but nothing happens. The machine keeps on running and doesn't go down for a reboot. Any idea what might be causing this?
(I'm trying to upgrade from intrepid to jaunty)
this would be a good time to consider whether you have a backup plan in case you succeed in getting the system to shutdown, but it won't start back up...
yeah. I have: wait till tomorrow, then go visit the server hosting :)
